_comment: Claude Code settings template - Copy to .claude_settings.json for local use
_security_note: Default settings use SAFE, READ-ONLY permissions. Enable additional permissions below as needed.

permissions._defaultMode_note: Safe default: read-only access. Change to 'edit' to allow code modifications.

_full_permissions_example._note: Uncomment the array below to ENABLE FULL PERMISSIONS for code editing, bash commands, and web access
_full_permissions_example._instructions: To enable full permissions: 1) Remove 'allow_full' and '_instructions' keys, 2) Replace 'allow' array with 'allow_full' contents, 3) Set 'defaultMode' to 'edit'
